messages.title: Real change for Britain
messages.content: Only the Liberal Democrats have a plan to change Britain's future.

messages.title: It's Julian or Corbyn's Labour here
messages.content: Bookies and pundits agree Conservatives out of the race. Ashcroft declares Cambridge 'seat to watch.'

messages.title: Julian's plan to fight for Cambridge
messages.content: People from right across the political spectrum are backing Julian to make a return to Parliament and implement his plan of action for Cambridge.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lib Dems are the only party committed to keeping Britain in the single market and will fight any deal that harms jobs and public services.
Lib Dems plan to raise extra £6 billion in NHS and social care.
Lib Dems promise to protect state pension with triple lock.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Conservatives out of the race, bookies and pundits agree. Ashcroft declares Cambridge 'seat to watch.'

issues.brexitEurope: Only the Lib Dems can stop hard Brexit.
issues.education: Work to deliver even more for local families including in education.
issues.health: Plan to raise extra £6 billion in NHS and social care, resolve the crisis in our NHS.
issues.socialWelfare: Protection of the state pension with triple lock.

housing.content: Build affordable homes for local people

leaflet.personalStatement: People from right across the political spectrum are backing Julian to make a return to Parliament.

politicalExperience.achievements: Built a reputation for securing improvements for Cambridge, delivered on stopping Brexit, and working to deliver even more for local families.

endorsements.endorsement: Only the Lib Dems can stop hard Brexit.
Lib Dems plan to invest an extra £6 billion in NHS and social care.
Lib Dems promise to protect state pension with triple lock.

quotes.text: Only the Lib Dems can stop hard Brexit.
Lib Dems promise to protect state pension with triple lock.

images.caption: Graph showing Lib Dems at 35%, Labour at 36%, Conservatives at 16%.
Julian Huppert engaging with a local family.
Julian Huppert with diverse group of supporters.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Julian earned praise for putting the needs of city before party politics. Julian's approach is straightforward and not extreme.
